Package com.openclassrooms.paymybuddy.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Integer>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Integer>
Repository interface for managing User entities. This interface extends CrudRepository to provide CRUD operations for the User entity.

Methods:

  • findByEmail(java.lang.String) : Finds a user by their email address.
  • existsByUsername(java.lang.String) : Checks if a user exists with the given username.
  • existsByEmail(java.lang.String) : Checks if a user exists with the given email address.
  • existsByEmailAndPasswordOrUsernameAndPassword(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) : Checks if a user exists with the email and password, or with the username and password.
  • findByEmailOrUsername(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) : Finds a user by their email address or username.

  • Method Details

    • findByEmail

      Optional<User> findByEmail(String email)
      Finds a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user to search for.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the User if found, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • existsByUsername

      boolean existsByUsername(String username)
      Checks if a user exists with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • existsByEmail

      boolean existsByEmail(String email)
      Checks if a user exists with the given email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • existsByEmailAndPasswordOrUsernameAndPassword

      boolean existsByEmailAndPasswordOrUsernameAndPassword(String email, String password1, String username, String password2)
      Checks if a user exists with the email and password, or with the username and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      password1 - The password associated with the email.
      username - The username.
      password2 - The password associated with the username.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists with the email and password, or with the username and password, otherwise false.

    • findByEmailOrUsername

      User findByEmailOrUsername(String email, String username)
      Finds a user by their email address or username.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user.
      username - The username.
      Returns:
      The found user, or null if no user is found.
